Downtown Private Events

Book an Event

Looking for the perfect venue to host your next private event? Look no further! We offer an exquisite setting for all your special occasions. Whether you're planning a corporate gathering, a milestone celebration, or an intimate social event, our versatile spaces and exceptional service will make your event unforgettable.

For all inquiries, please fill out the form below and we’ll be in touch soon.

[Page Title: Bodega | Big Apple Inspired Brunch in SC]

Home
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 10 Slide 2 of 10 Slide 3 of 10 Slide 4 of 10 Slide 5 of 10 Slide 6 of 10 Slide 7 of 10 Slide 8 of 10 Slide 9 of 10 Slide 10 of 10 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Welcome to

Bodega is a true “can’t miss” whether it be dining at one of our two locations, a day on the boat, or a lazy Sunday on the couch! For those looking for a nice morning pick me up, our coffee program is 2nd to none!

Choose your Bodega

Mt Pleasant

Downtown Charleston

Our Story

For those that grew up in the New York/metropolitan area, there is nothing more nostalgic than a good ole fashioned “Bodega” breakfast sandwich on a warm kaiser roll. Executive Chef Alec Gropman brings his childhood favorite to life with a menu full of old school brunch staples, some with a Charleston twist!

Catering

Let us cater your next event!
Inquire Now 
Skip the line!

Order from either of our locations for pick up or delivery!
Order Online 
Swag!

Give a gift card to a friend so they can treat you to a night of good food and drinks!
Share the Love 
Follow along
@eatdrinkbodega Order Online Email Signup
